name: yanraintoolreactv3
description: YanRainToolBox React/Electron 工具箱，支持安卓刷机和设备管理。
author: 18203173685@163.com

scripts.build:win: node -e "(async () => { const fs = await import('fs'); const { execSync } = await import('child_process'); process.env.TARGET_PLATFORM = 'win32'; ['dist', 'releases'].forEach(dir => { try { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); } catch(e) {} }); execSync('pnpm run build', { stdio: 'inherit' }); })()"
scripts.build:linux: node -e "(async () => { const fs = await import('fs'); const { execSync } = await import('child_process'); process.env.TARGET_PLATFORM = 'linux'; ['dist', 'releases'].forEach(dir => { try { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); } catch(e) {} }); execSync('pnpm run build', { stdio: 'inherit' }); })()"
scripts.build:mac: node -e "(async () => { const fs = await import('fs'); const { execSync } = await import('child_process'); process.env.TARGET_PLATFORM = 'darwin'; ['dist', 'releases'].forEach(dir => { try { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); } catch(e) {} }); execSync('pnpm run build', { stdio: 'inherit' }); })()"
